headline: IFF Introduces Smart Dosing Robot to Transform Fragrance Production
summary: CHIN BEE, Singapore, November 24, 2025--IFF (NYSE: IFF) — a global leader in flavors, fragrances, food ingredients, health and biosciences, has implemented the Colibri robot in its Chin Bee production facility. This advanced industrial dosing system can produce fragrance sample batches on demand in minutes, reimagining and expediting the fragrance development journey for local, regional and global customers in Greater Asia.

thumbnail.caption: Photo credit: IFF - Colleagues at IFF Chin Bee with the site's new smart-dosing robot.

headline: Is International Flavors & Fragrances a Value Opportunity After Recent Strategic Partnerships?
summary: If you have ever wondered whether International Flavors & Fragrances is a value opportunity or a potential value trap, you are in the right place. Despite a challenging year with shares down 24.2% over the past 12 months, recent weeks show signs of stabilization, with a 3.6% gain in the last week and 2.3% in the last month. Behind these moves, the company has made headlines with new strategic partnerships and expansion into emerging markets. This news has caught investors’ attention and...
